author: Toufiqur Rahaman Chowdhury
description: A compilation of re-usable, high-quality tools and utilities for TypeScript that have been developed and refined over many years. The collection aims to solve common real-world problems with elegant, robust, practical and well-tested solutions.
name: superutils

scripts.old-docs: npm run docs:build-packages && node scripts/docs-try-button.js && vitepress dev docs
scripts.old-docs:build: npm run docs:coverage && npm run docs:build-packages && node scripts/docs-try-button.js && vitepress build docs && cp docs/assets/* docs/.vitepress/dist/assets/
scripts.docs: npm run docs:build-packages && vitepress dev docs
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:coverage && npm run docs:build-packages && vitepress build docs && cp docs/assets/* docs/.vitepress/dist/assets/
scripts.publish:prepare: npm run test :1 && npm run lint && npm run docs:build && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run clean:purge && npm run build && npm run build:watch
